Installation¶

Required Tools¶

  • Node.js

Required Tools¶

  • Node.js

  • Express

Installation Steps¶

  1. Clone Repository (https://github.com/JadynF/Rockr)

  2. Ensure Node.js and Express are installed

  3. cd into /client

  4. Run npm i

  5. Everything should be ready to run, see Usage

Rockr
